title: As ‘Halo Infinite’ esports enters year 2, teams express cautious optimism
description: Bogged down by a rocky debut year for ‘Halo Infinite,’ the pro scene marches on with subdued expectations.

title: No one can tell if a new patch fixed ‘Pokémon Scarlet’ and ‘Violet’
description: "Pokemon Scarlet" and "Violet" players hoped the 1.1 patch would fix the game's buggy visuals. But no one can tell if the game actually looks better.

title: Workers at Diablo, Warcraft developer Blizzard Albany win union
description: The news marks a second significant win for Game Workers Alliance, the first union at a major video game company in the U.S.

title: Buying stuff in apps is broken. Try this instead.
description: Fights over app store rules written a decade ago are making more apps impossible to use, costing you money, and compromising what you can do on your phone.

title: League of Legends veteran, 26, says gaming is his life until he retires
description: Zeka and Deft talked about what it was like to challenge T1 and Faker.

title: TSA now wants to scan your face at security. Here are your rights.
description: 16 major domestic airports are testing facial-recognition tech to verify IDs — and it could go nationwide in 2023.

title: Elon Musk says Ye suspended from Twitter after swastika tweet
description: Musk said Ye was suspended for "incitement to violence" after he posted a swastika and his interview with Infowars's Alex Jones praising Hitler.
